import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import {useForm} from 'react-hook-form' import axios from 'axios' import Delete from './Delete' function EditCard(props){ const url = 'http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/v1/create' const {register, handleSubmit, reset,errors} = useForm() const onSubmit = (data) => { axios.post(url,data) .then(function(response){ console.log(response) alert('Succefully Created!') window.location.reload(); }) .catch(function(error){ console.log(error) }) } return (

{props.info.title}

{props.info.description}

Create Card

{errors.title && This field is required}
{errors.description && This field is required}
) } export default EditCard
